data.name: IT Startup: Deckbreaker
data.detailed_description:
IT Startup: Deckbreaker is a single player Rougelike Deckbuilder card game. The game idea is loosely based on the physical card game "IT Startup - The Card Game" (released 2018 in Poland, released worldwide in 2020).

Features


  • Explore the world and collect "IT Startup" cards to build your deck with.
  • Fight epic IT card battles in Project Arenas!
  • Over 150 unique cards.
  • Use consumable items, to give your unique deck strategy an extra boost.
  • Risk management. Don't get into to risky project battles, or you may go bankrupt (going bankrupt = permadeath in "IT Startup: Deckbreaker")

The card game for DEVs, HR and IT enthusiasts. Turn coffee into code, watch out for burnout!


  • Play Developer card to build your project.
  • Raise your DEV’s efficiency with Knowledge Cards and watch out for burnout.
  • Sabotage your opponents with Action Cards and steal their developers with HR!



Don't forget your HR department, to get more cards for you company and occasionally steal opponents' employees. Use your Agile Coach to boost your developer team. Project Managers are also available. Swing the game in your favor when playing them at the right moment!

data.short_description: Play Software Developer cards to build your project! Raise your DEV’s efficiency with Knowledge Cards and watch out for burnout. Sabotage your opponents with Action Cards and steal their developers with HR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
